definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: zhi3 ke3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: ke3 yi3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

sentences.english: Becoming a doctor requires years of training there are really no short cuts.
sentences.chinese: 当医生需要多年的学习和锻炼实无捷径可言。

sentences.english: There is no love lost between Doris and Arvid.
sentences.chinese: 多丽丝和阿维德之间毫无爱情可言。

sentences.english: It is rather to be thought of than expressed what was now my condition.
sentences.chinese: 我现在的情形是只可意会，不可言传的。

sentences.english: We won’t be safe if we can’t count on our infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们不依靠基础设施建设，我们将毫无安全可言。

sentences.english: Between "everywhere" and "forever" there is no compromise.
sentences.chinese: “处处”和“永远”之间是没有妥协可言的。

sentences.english: What is natural about electric muscle stimulation?
sentences.chinese: 通过电击来刺激肌肉有何天然性可言？

sentences.english: There is no institution of property.
Having a perfect cabinet is a wonderful thing.
sentences.chinese: 拥有一套完美的橱柜是一件妙不可言的事。

sentences.english: There's a lot of volatility in exchange rates.
sentences.chinese: 汇率的波动毫无定数可言。

sentences.english: There’s certainly nothingrational about putting the cart before the horse.
sentences.chinese: 本末倒置当然没有任何理性可言。

sentences.english: No Black Hat Tactics at all, this will be checked before payment.
sentences.chinese: 无黑帽战术可言，这将是在付款前检查。

sentences.english: "There are no fair and free elections in China, " said Li Fan.
sentences.chinese: “中国的选举没有公平和自由可言，”李凡说。

sentences.english: Well uh-uh baby I ain't got no plan.
sentences.chinese: 喔，啊哈，我没有什么计画可言。

sentences.english: It was a lovely dinner-party of fourteen.
sentences.chinese: 当天的宴会妙不可言，席上一共有十四个人。

sentences.english: It sure is wonderful to be here with my friend!
sentences.chinese: 和我的朋友在一起简直就是妙不可言。

sentences.english: There is also a story to speak of.
sentences.chinese: 锅盖面还有一段故事可言的。

definition: not in the least/to completely lack
to obliterate completely/to vanish from the face of the earth
the slightest amount or degree/a bit
to be used up/to be exhausted
nothing other than/to differ in no way from/the same as/to amount to
to be nothing to write home about (idiom)
clearly and easy to see (idiom); obviously/clearly/it goes without saying
to take into consideration/to attend to
